page.title: 19GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: 1 Kiss Catch You can only play this if you have got a girl friend or boy friend.Then you let them run out and chase them.When you catch them you,ve got to kiss them.Then it is their turn to chase you. 2 Catch 45 Catch 45 is an easy game.All you have to do is one person is on it and they have to count up the number that they are told. Then the rest of us have to run away from that person. The person on it runs after you and when he touches you, you are on it with him.When he and the other people caught have caught all the people, they start again.Who ever is the person caught first that one is on it and it carries on and on. 3 Red Rover When you play Red Rover you have to
